content: # **2025-12-24 WEEKLY REPORT** ## Blog Posts * **Status**: * **2025-12-17** - [Patch Release v2\.36\.1](https://status.app/blog/patch-release-v2-36-1-2) _Fixed a crash on the Home page, a stuck loading issue when voting on t..._ ## Forum Posts * **Logos**: * **2025-12-17** - General - [Logos Circle Prage #3](https://forum.logos.co/t/logos-circle-prage-3/1463/1) * **2025-12-17** - Meetups - [Logos Circle Nairobi #2](https://forum.logos.co/t/logos-circle-nairobi-2/1462/1) * **Status**: * **2025-12-22** - Feature requests - [Automatic Updates for Desktop App](https://discuss.status.app/t/automatic-updates-for-desktop-app/6659/1) * **Vac**: * **2025-12-17** - Logos - [RLN with pre-computed proofs](https://forum.vac.dev/t/rln-with-pre-computed-proofs/606/1) ## YouTube Videos **2025-12-23** - Logos Circle: Online - December 23, 2025 **2025-12-18** - Parallel Society Convergence **2025-12-22** - Defending Privacy: What Actually Works **2025-12-17** - IFT Townhall - December 19, 2025 ## Releases * **Keycard**: * **2025-12-17** status-keycard-java - [3.1.5](https://github.com/keycard-tech/status-keycard-java/releases/tag/3.1.5) * **Nimbus**: * **2025-12-18** nimbus-eth2 - [v25.12.0](https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/releases/tag/v25.12.0) * **Status**: * **2025-12-17** status-app - [2.36.1](https://github.com/status-im/status-app/releases/tag/2.36.1) * **Vac**: * **2025-12-18** hashgraph-like-consensus - [Release v0.1.0](https://github.com/vacp2p/hashgraph-like-consensus/releases/tag/v0.1.0)
